Submodules¶

models.cnn_reconstruct.models module¶

models.cnn_reconstruct.models.reconstruct_cnn(ntr, npr)[source]¶

Builds a cnn reconstruction model

Parameters

  • ntr – (int) Number of translation steps

  • npr – (int) Number of tomographic angles

Returns

A tensorflow model
